channel.title: BUhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Smoking and Alcohol Raise the Risk of Breast Cancer
item.description: Breast cancer affects 1 in 8 U.S. women. Learn how lifestyle choices like smoking and drinking may influence your risk and what you can do about it.

item.title: Why Gardening Is Good for Your Mental Well-Being
Simple Ways to Breathe Easier Indoors
These 3 Types Of People Should Definitely Take A Probiotic
item.description: Of all the supplements out there, probiotics earn a spot toward the top of the priority list.

item.title: This Tea Rinse Is Like An At-Home Salon Appointment & Helps With Hair Growth
item.description: Trust, your tresses will be better for it.

item.title: The One Step You're Missing For Softer, Tighter Body Skin
item.description: Because your body skin deserves some TLC, too.

item.title: Lower Your Risk Of Cancer 24% By Getting Enough Of This Essential Vitamin
item.description: The complicated relationship of vitamin D and disease.

item.title: I Study Coincidences: Here's How To Make Sense Of Random Twists Of Fate
item.description: They happen more than you think.
